subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: The quarterback’s decision not to enter the N.F.L. draft last year, when he was highly rated, will serve as a cautionary tale for underclassmen. He fell to the fourth round Saturday.
snippet: The quarterback’s decision not to enter the N.F.L. draft last year, when he was highly rated, will serve as a cautionary tale for underclassmen. He fell to the fourth round Saturday.
